snippet: Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, who is facing a sexual harassment scandal, is looking to races populated by loyalists to help him retain an influential foothold.
abstract: Assemblyman Vito J Lopez, who is about to relinquish his post as Kings County Democratic leader over charges of sexual harassment, is looking to retain an influential political foothold in Brooklyn by keeping some loyalists in place in north Brooklyn; contest for Democrat leader in the 50th Assembly District, which covers Fort Greene, Greenpoint and Williamsburg, is among the races that could keep his power base intact.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, who is facing a sexual harassment scandal, is looking to races populated by loyalists to help him retain an influential foothold.

headline.seo: For Vito Lopez, Grip on Power May Hinge on Loyalists in Primary Races
headline.main: Through Primaries, Embattled Assemblyman Seeks to Shore Up Clout
headline.print_headline: Through Primaries, Embattled Assemblyman Seeks to Shore Up Clout
